Summary Note:
Mathilde Alma Nielsen and the RM are cousins, having grown up together in Zürich. Their familial bond has naturally extended into a professional partnership built on mutual respect and shared values.
Mathilde Alma Nielsen is a 30 year old Developer from Switzerland.
She was impressed by Julius Baer's global presence and expertise in private banking, leading to the decision to join.
Family Background: Mathilde Alma Nielsen is currently single. She does not have any children.
Education Background:
Mathilde obtained her secondary school diploma from Østre Borgerdyd Gymnasium in 2013.
Mathilde pursued higher education at Copenhagen Business Academy, graduating in 2019.
Occupation History:
Mathilde Alma Nielsen is a 30 year old Developer from Switzerland.
Mathilde Alma Nielsen's first role was as a Property Manager at Züblin Immobilien AG, where she worked diligently from 2019 to 2023 to establish a strong reputation.
At Züblin Immobilien AG, she held the position of Developer from 2023 to 2025, making significant contributions to the organization.
Wealth Summary:
She managed to save approximately 250000 CHF from her earnings at all companies.
She owns house in Lucerne, where she resides. It is worth 3220000 CHF.

She inherited a significant sum of 720000 CHF from her grandfather, a respected Stock Trader, in 2016, which she has wisely invested.
Client Summary: The RM is very happy to have Mathilde as a customer and is looking forward to a long and successful cooperation.
